fields.name: assetName
fields.description: Name of the asset if available.

fields.name: assetEndpointProfileRef
fields.description: A reference to the asset endpoint profile.

fields.name: manufacturerUri
fields.description: URI to the manufacturer of the asset.

fields.name: documentationUri
fields.description: URI to the documentation of the asset.

fields.name: datasets
fields.description: Array of datasets that are part of the asset. Each dataset spec describes the datapoints that make up the set.

fields.name: events
fields.description: Array of events that are part of the asset. Each event can reference an asset type capability and have per-event configuration.
